item.title: Trump administration asks the Supreme Court to restore ‘DOGE’ access to Social Security data
item.description: Solicitor General Sauer says the existing restrictions harm urgent federal priorities

item.title: My father is giving me $250K to buy a home, but told me not to tell my two siblings. Am I morally obligated to tell them?
item.description: “I don’t want to jeopardize my father’s kind offer.”

item.title: OPEC+ crashed oil prices by hiking output in April. Here’s why it could do that again.
item.description: OPEC+ will now meet Saturday — instead of Monday, as previously planned — according to news reports.

item.title: ‘Retirement is within my grasp’: I’m 57, my 401(k) is dropping and I’m feeling anxious about a recession. What can I do?
item.description: “I feel like I’m fiddling while Wall Street burns.”

item.title: My sister has a learning disability and her husband squandered $100,000. How do I protect her after I’m gone?
item.description: “She always worked part-time in a grocery store or at stock-clerk jobs until COVID. He does Instacart and similar deliveries for work.”
